text: Charles William Dougherty (February 7, 1862 - February 18, 1925) was a major league baseball player for Altoona Mountain City in 1884. He was their second baseman, and he hit a .259 batting average. ==Sources== Category:1862 births Category:1925 deaths Category:19th-century baseball players Category:Baseball players from Wisconsin Category:Altoona Mountain Citys players Category:Major League Baseball second basemen Category:People from Darlington, Wisconsin Category:Wilmington Blue Hens players Category:Atlantic City (minor league baseball) players Category:Altoona Mountain Cities players
title: Charlie Dougherty
